about_the_game:
ABOUT THE GAME

A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor.
The story continues with Nikki and her husband meeting her boss for a live cuckolding experience.
Will Adam enjoy being dominated by the guy who fucks his wife? Follow their Sex Story and find out!

GAME DESCRIPTION

Meet Nikki & Adam, and embark on their journey of spicing up their marital life in a brand new and wild cuckold Sex Story.

EPISODE 7
When Adam told Nikki he would like to be in the same room next time she fucks a guy, the slutty wife wasn’t surprised at all. After all, it felt like a natural step in their cuckolding journey.
The problem was finding the right guy to help them make this happen. She needed someone fun and discreet, with enough experience to know how to handle her cuck husband without hurting his feelings or, even worse, judging him for his dirty desires during or after the fact.
Luckily for both, Nikki knew just the perfect motherfucker for the job, and the cocky boss was more than eager to help turn Adam’s dirty fantasy into reality. After a few scheduling errors, they finally managed to put together a plan and meet tonight to give this fantasy a try.

Will this night be everything Adam wishes for? Will he enjoy being dominated by the guy who fucks his wife?
Follow their Sex Story and find out!

content_descriptors.notes: The game graphically depicts sex in still images among male/female characters.
